title: Winter Summer
description: Korean drama about American Johnny finding love and loss while visiting on business.
quote: That new female work person from work has beauty that is beautiful.
altHero: Glen Quagmire and Hee-Sun sitting on a bench holding hands
alt1: Quagmire as American Johnny, wearing an American flag jacket and sitting in a bar with Japanese coworkers
alt2: American Johnny chatting with a woman at the bar
alt3: Johnny getting married in a traditional Japanese ceremony
alt4: Johnny holding his dead fiance on the ground
